segments.text: You still have not given me those files I ’ Ve asked you for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Mr . Myers . I ’ Ve just been so busy today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don ’ t want to hear your excuses , Janet . We ’ re running a busy office here . You ’ re going to have to keep up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right , sir . I apologize . I ’ ll get those files for you now .
segments.speaker: S2
